requirements.summary: Implement notes management UI with create, read, update, and delete functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new notes with title and content
Users can view a list of all their notes

file_operations.description: Create a component that fetches and displays all notes using the getAllNotes backend method. Include buttons for editing and deleting each note. Style with cute aesthetic elements including rounded corners and soft shadows.
Create a form component for creating and editing notes with title and content fields. Use createNote and updateNote backend methods. Include save and cancel buttons with cute hover effects.
Create a reusable note card component to display individual notes with title and content preview. Style with pastel colors, rounded corners, and soft shadows to match the cute aesthetic.

Create the main notes page that combines NotesList and NoteEditor components. Manage state for creating/editing modes and handle note selection. Include the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/cloud-icon.dim_128x128.png as a decorative header element.
Create a custom hook that manages notes state and provides functions for CRUD operations using backend methods (getAllNotes, createNote, updateNote, deleteNote). Handle loading and error states.
Wire the NotesPage into the application routing. Add navigation to access the notes section. Ensure the cute aesthetic styling is applied globally through className props.

requirements.summary: Implement to-do list UI with add, toggle completion, and delete functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add new to-do items
Each to-do item has a checkbox to mark as complete/incomplete
Completed tasks are visually distinguished from incomplete tasks

file_operations.description: Create a component that fetches and displays all tasks using the getAllTasks backend method. Include checkboxes using the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/check-icon.dim_64x64.png for completed tasks and delete buttons for each task.

Create a reusable to-do item component with checkbox, task description, and delete button. Use toggleTaskCompletion and deleteTask backend methods. Apply visual distinction for completed tasks with opacity changes and strike-through text.

Create a form component for adding new to-do items with an input field and submit button. Use the addTask backend method. Style with cute rounded corners and pastel colors. Include the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/star-icon.dim_96x96.png as a decorative element.
Create the main to-do list page that combines TodoList and AddTodoForm components. Manage the task list state and handle updates when tasks are toggled or deleted.

Create a custom hook that manages tasks state and provides functions for add, toggle, and delete operations using backend methods (getAllTasks, addTask, toggleTaskCompletion, deleteTask). Handle loading and error states.
Wire the TodoPage into the application routing. Add navigation to access the to-do list section alongside notes.

requirements.summary: Implement cute aesthetic theme with pastel colors, rounded corners, soft shadows, and playful typography
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft pastel colors (pinks, lavenders, mint greens, peaches)
UI components feature rounded corners and soft shadows
Buttons and interactive elements have cute hover effects
Overall design feels cohesive and adorable
Icons and visual elements match the cute aesthetic

file_operations.description: Extend the Tailwind configuration with a custom cute aesthetic color palette including pastel pinks, lavenders, mint greens, and peaches. Add custom spacing and border-radius utilities for rounded corners. Define shadow utilities for soft shadows.

Add global CSS styles for the cute aesthetic theme including custom font imports for playful typography, base styling for body and headings with friendly fonts, and global transitions for smooth hover effects.

Create a layout component that wraps the application with consistent cute aesthetic styling including pastel background gradients, rounded container elements with soft shadows, and a playful header/navigation bar.
Wrap the application routes with the Layout component to ensure consistent cute aesthetic styling across all pages.

requirements.summary: Wire generated decorative images as static assets in the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced correctly in components
Images load properly and enhance the cute aesthetic

file_operations.description: Reference the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/cloud-icon.dim_128x128.png in an img element as a decorative header or accent element on the notes page.
Reference the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/star-icon.dim_96x96.png in an img element as a decorative element near the add button or form header.
Reference the generated frontend/public/assets/generated/check-icon.dim_64x64.png in an img element to display as the checkbox indicator for completed tasks instead of a standard checkbox.
